sentences.english: Vibrio cholerae 01 sero type inaba has been confirmed in some of the affected areas.
sentences.chinese: 在有些疫区已确认存在01稻叶血清型霍乱弧菌。

sentences.english: Travelers from SARS hot ots are being isolated for 10 days.
sentences.chinese: 从沙士疫区前来的旅客将被隔离十天。

sentences.english: Children living in or visiting rabies-affected areas are at particular risk.
sentences.chinese: 在狂犬病疫区生活或停留的儿童面临的风险尤其高。

sentences.english: Poultry products from those countries were embargoed by many places.
sentences.chinese: 疫区的禽产品在世界许多国家遭到禁运。

sentences.english: Methods The host animal in epidemic area was investigated through direct culture of the pathogen and hemagglutination test.
sentences.chinese: 方法用病原培养和血清凝集试验调查疫区宿主动物。

sentences.english: Travelers from SARS hotspots are being isolated for 10 days.
sentences.chinese: 从沙士疫区前来的旅客将被隔离十天。

sentences.english: They then establish quarantines to control the movement of people in and out of those areas.
sentences.chinese: 然后建立隔离区来控制疫区人群的来往。

sentences.english: All public water supply systems in the affected districts have been chlorinated by the provincial authorities.
sentences.chinese: 疫区的所有公用水供应系统已由省当局用氯进行消毒。

sentences.english: The used materials were from non-avian flu epidemic area.
sentences.chinese: 所用原料来自于非禽流感疫区。
